education_text.0: Ullman received a Bachelor of Science degree in      Applied mathematics engineering mathematics from      Columbia University Columbia University in 1963 and his PhD in      Electrical engineering electrical engineering from      Princeton University Princeton University in 1966Ullman's research interests include      Database theory database theory,      Data integration data integration,      Data mining data mining, and education using online infrastructureIn 2011, Ullman stated his opposition to assisting Iranians in becoming graduate students at Stanford, because of the Israel position of the Iranian government
